name: Season hiking map
description:
Spring trips: from June Week 1 x per week 
Summer operation:
Matrei: 25.06. to 10/09/2017
Kal: 25.06. to 24/09/2017
Daily from 9: 00- 11:30 and 13: 00-16: 30 PM.
closed in bad weather!
Available from June 2017 to 24 September 2017: St. Matreier Goldried mountain railways, cable cars Kals am Grossglockner, Hochpustertaler tracks Sillian, ski Jakob iD, Mölltaler Glacier (Glacier Express and EUB) and high mountain Ankogel.
Each one ascent and descent of 2 sections per day. Only for pedestrians without sports equipment.

itemOffered.description: Each one ascent and descent of 2 sections per day. Only for pedestrians without sports equipment.\r\n        All prices are in EURO and include VAT. Children born in 1999 -2011. Opening times and operating hours as posted. Errors, misprint, schedule and fare changes.
